parameters: \FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>Now, it's finally time for you to join the operation.
\FX[F]\AA[FFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Eliza>...That said, it will be a solo mission for you.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Eliza>You are to head to the locations where there have been
sightings of mysterious beings. Currently, there are
sightings at three locations.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Eliza>The damage situation and sightings of the mysterious beings
are briefly noted, including an estimate of the difficulty
level.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0007]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Eliza>Of course, you should start with the lowest difficulty. The
higher the difficulty, the greater the danger to you.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Eliza>Also, there's plenty of time. It's not about conquering in
one go but returning once to regroup, prepare your
equipment, replenish items, etc. Be very careful.

※In this game, defeat does not lead to game over. However,
defeat might lead to something terrible...!?
\AA[FFFF]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0009]\N<Eliza>Well done for coming!! Now, choose your destination!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Abandoned Mine】Danger Level: 1 Recently, sightings of BB
Gang combatants "The Cores" have been frequent in the
abandoned mine. They might be plotting something. I'd like
you to check it out!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Abandoned Mine】Danger Level: 1 This is where The Cores
gathered and were pursued. But this place has already been
resolved♪

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Forest】Danger Level: 2 There have been reports of "Goblins"
controlled by the BB Gang appearing. There are also reports
of missing local residents, they might be plotting
something. I want you to scatter those goblin brutes!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Forest】Danger Level: 2 Those goblin brutes were plotting
evil deeds. But, this has already been resolved♪

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Waterway】Danger Level: 3 It seems that monsters released by
the BB Gang have infiltrated the waterway. They must be
plotting something!! I want you to crush the enemy before
they cause any trouble!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Waterway】Danger Level: 3 Planning to mix poison into the
drinking water, what an outrageous plot... but, this place
has also been resolved♪
